law.catch_line: Reimbursement Of Expenses Of Persons Representing Commonwealth At Conventions
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 14. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] The governor and council may reimburse members of unpaid commissions, and citizens who may be sent officially to represent the commonwealth at national conventions, for such expenses as they may find reasonably necessary.
